text:
Roomi | http://roomiapp.com

Currently 44 Million of Americans live with roommates. We are trying to replace Craigslist and give people a better way to find roommates. Roomi has over 100K downloads while only being launched in one city and growing at over 20% month over month

We are looking for senior developers in SF and NY: - full-stack (Node.js, AWS, Angular) - iOS developer - Android developer More details at https://angel.co/roomi
